hostEONS.com - DDOS Protected SSD KVM VPS in LA, USA - $2.4/m

Hosteons.com - We provide VPS Hosting Services with servers co-located in LA, USA. All our VPS Packages comes with unmetered bandwidth and also includes DDOS Protection at no additional charge.

Some of the features of our VPS hosting service:

1) VPS Control Panel to reboot and reinstall (SolusVM)
2) VNC Access (HTML 5 as well as Java)
3) DDOS Protection
4) Instant Activation
5) Free IPv4 as well as Free IPv6 (/64)
6) Full RDNS Control
7) IRC Allowed
8) Private Proxy/VPN Allowed
9) China Optimised network also included at no additional charge.
10) RAID 10 SSD Drives (We use Pure SSD for best Disk I/O Performance)
11) KVM Virtualization.
12) Unmetered Bandwidth.
13) cPanel optional.
14) Windows OS also available depending upon VPS Package.
